definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Ivory fruit is a kind of South America Ecuador palm trees coconut.
sentences.chinese: 象牙果是一种南美厄瓜多尔的棕榈树椰果。

sentences.english: "Ecuador has nearly lost one third of its ice," says the glaciologist Bolivar Caceres, the head of the government's glacier and meteorology unit.
sentences.chinese: 厄瓜多尔几乎失去了三分之一的冰。

sentences.english: We took an underweight position in Ecuadorian bonds.
sentences.chinese: 我们减持了厄瓜多尔债券。

sentences.english: It was always unlikely Valencia would be involved, as he has been on Copa América duty with Ecuador.
sentences.chinese: 而且他也应当不会持续参加厄瓜多尔的美洲杯比赛。

sentences.english: Tungurahua is about 130 kilometers southeast of the capital Quito.
sentences.chinese: 通古拉瓦位于厄瓜多尔首都基多东南约130公里。

sentences.english: I was born in Ecuador but I feel very Arab too.
sentences.chinese: 我出生在厄瓜多尔，但是我也感到自己是阿拉伯人。

sentences.english: Patino says the right of asylum is recognised by the Ecuadoran constitution.
sentences.chinese: 他说，厄瓜多尔宪法保护避难人的权利。

sentences.english: The scientists will sail on board a tuna purse-seine vessel from Ecuador.
sentences.chinese: 这些科学家将坐上厄瓜多尔的金枪鱼捕捞船。

sentences.english: The Ecuadorian people treasure their friendship with the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 厄瓜多尔人民珍视同中国人民的友谊。

sentences.english: Ivory is a South American fruit tree Coconut palm in Ecuador.
sentences.chinese: 象牙果是一种南美厄瓜多尔的棕榈树椰果。

sentences.english: Oil is very important in a country like Ecuador.
sentences.chinese: 石油在厄瓜多尔这样的国家非常重要。

sentences.english: In an ideal world we would only use renewable energy in Ecuador.
sentences.chinese: 理想的是，在厄瓜多尔，我们只使用可再生能源。

pinyin: Duo1 mi3 ni2 jia1 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
